name: CPT Calender Widget for WordPress
author: Ahir Hemant

sections.description:
1. Create Custom Post and and select CPT from dropdown.
  2. CPT Calnder Widget for WordPress is the easiest way to Display CPT Calnder in page and post
  3. Create Custom Post type Select from deropdown and add widget in sidebar.
  4. feel free to contact me via support
  5. please rate this plugin,Thanks
  6. enjoy!
    please check installation and screenshot tab for more idea!.

Features

  • Fully integrated
  • Fully responsive design
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire CPT Calender Widget folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. drag and drop CPT Calender widget in sidebar area
  4. Select your post from dropdown
  5. Call that sidebar in your page/post
  6. enjoy!
  7. feel free to contact me via support
  8. please rate this plugin,Thanks
sections.faq:
Is there any cost?

Ans.No.

Do you require any sign up?

No.

How to display in page/post ?

Add in sidebar and call particular sidebar in Page/post

Used function written by Jennifer Dodd that did exactly this
